name: Les Aimants
description: Our bridal brand and retail solution eases the shopping experience by using 3D fitting and industrializing the manufacturing of wedding gowns. This solves timeline, customization, and alteration problems, making the process more efficient for the bride.
one_liner: Our bridal brand and retail solution eases the shopping experience by using 3D fitting and industrializing the manufacturing of wedding gowns. This solves timeline, customization, and alteration problems, making the process more efficient for the bride.
